title: Return & Departure

image.alt: Aerial view of Reykjavik city with colorful buildings and mountains in background

quote.text: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quote.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

shortSummary: Conclude your Ring Road adventure with a morning in Akranes before returning to Reykjav√≠k for last-minute shopping and a farewell lunch, reflecting on your incredible Icelandic journey.
summary: As your Icelandic adventure comes to a close, today offers a final taste of this remarkable island. Begin with a leisurely morning in Akranes before heading back to the capital for some last-minute shopping and sightseeing in Reykjav√≠k. Enjoy a farewell lunch sampling Icelandic cuisine one last time before heading to the airport. Take the time to reflect on the incredible landscapes, experiences, and memories you've collected circumnavigating this land of fire and ice.

schedule.title: Breakfast at Airbnb
schedule.description: Enjoy a final breakfast at your accommodation in Akranes.

schedule.title: Check out and depart for Reykjav√≠k
schedule.description: Check out of your Airbnb and begin the drive back to Reykjav√≠k for some final sightseeing and shopping.
quickStops: Akranes Lighthouse - quick photo stop if not visited the evening before

schedule.title: Shopping in Reykjav√≠k
schedule.description: Enjoy some last-minute shopping in downtown Reykjav√≠k for Icelandic souvenirs, woolen goods, or design items. Laugavegur and Sk√≥lav√∂r√∞ust√≠gur streets offer the best selection of shops.
details: Laugavegur street is Reykjav√≠k's main shopping street
Sk√≥lav√∂r√∞ust√≠gur has many artisan and design stores
Popular souvenirs include Icelandic wool products, lava jewelry, and Viking-themed items
The Kolaporti√∞ flea market is open on weekends
Tax-free shopping available with refunds at the airport

schedule.title: Visit to Seltjarnarnes Peninsula
schedule.description: Take a quick trip to this peninsula on the western edge of Reykjav√≠k featuring a lighthouse, bird sanctuary, and scenic coastal walks with views of Mount Esja across the bay.
details: Home to Gr√≥tta lighthouse at the westernmost tip
Views of Reykjav√≠k city, Mount Esja, and Faxafl√≥i Bay
Footbridge to the lighthouse island (accessible at low tide only)

schedule.title: Farewell Lunch in Reykjav√≠k
schedule.description: Enjoy a final Icelandic meal at Messinn, a popular restaurant known for its traditional fish pans and seafood dishes.

schedule.title: Drive to Keflav√≠k International Airport
schedule.description: Drive from Reykjav√≠k to the airport with enough time for rental car return and check-in procedures.
quickStops: Gas station to fill up the rental car before return

schedule.title: Return Rental Car
schedule.description: Return your Suzuki Vitara to Blue Car Rental and complete the necessary paperwork.

schedule.title: Airport Check-in
schedule.description: Check in for your international flight and proceed through security. Recommended to arrive at least 2 hours before departure for international flights.

schedule.title: Duty-Free Shopping and Relaxation
schedule.description: Browse the airport's extensive duty-free shopping area (known for good prices on Icelandic products and alcohol) and relax before your flight.
details: Keflav√≠k Airport offers extensive duty-free shopping
Good selection of Icelandic products and international brands
Alcohol and confectionery prices are generally lower than in town

schedule.title: Flight Departure
schedule.description: Board your Icelandair flight FI 671 from Keflav√≠k (KEF) to Denver (DEN), departing at 4:50 PM GMT.

highlights: Final shopping for Icelandic souvenirs in Reykjav√≠k
Coastal views and lighthouse at Seltjarnarnes Peninsula

accommodation.name: N/A - Departure Day
accommodation.notes: Check your Airbnb checkout time and plan accordingly. Most Airbnbs have a checkout time of 11:00 AM, but you may be able to leave your luggage if you communicate with your host.

alternatives.title: Blue Lagoon Visit
alternatives.description: If you didn't visit on arrival day, the Blue Lagoon is conveniently located between Reykjav√≠k and the airport. Perfect for relaxation before a long flight. Pre-booking essential.

alternatives.title: Reykjanes Peninsula Geothermal Areas
alternatives.description: Explore the volcanic landscapes of the Reykjanes UNESCO Global Geopark, including bubbling mud pools, steam vents, and dramatic geological formations.

alternatives.title: Perlan Museum
alternatives.description: Interactive museum with exhibitions about Icelandic nature, including a real indoor ice cave, Northern Lights planetarium show, and observation deck with 360¬∞ views of Reykjav√≠k.

alternatives.title: Hallgr√≠mskirkja Observation Deck
alternatives.description: Ascend the tower of Reykjav√≠k's iconic church for panoramic views over the colorful city and surrounding mountains and ocean.

alternatives.title: Sky Lagoon
alternatives.description: New luxury geothermal spa with an infinity edge overlooking the ocean. Features a 7-step spa ritual based on Icelandic traditions.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Harpa Concert Hall
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Explore the stunning glass architecture of Reykjav√≠k's concert hall and cultural center. The building itself is a work of art with its colored glass facade inspired by Iceland's basalt landscapes.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: National Museum of Iceland
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Comprehensive museum chronicling Iceland's history from settlement to present day, with artifacts and exhibits covering over 1,200 years.

badWeatherAlternatives.title: Kringlan Shopping Mall
badWeatherAlternatives.description: Iceland's largest shopping mall with over 150 shops, restaurants, and services. Good alternative for souvenir shopping in bad weather.

tip: If purchasing alcohol or other duty-free items, remember that Keflav√≠k Airport's prices are generally lower than in downtown Reykjav√≠k, so consider waiting until you reach the airport to make these purchases.
notes: Allow extra time for rental car return and airport procedures.
Double-check your rental agreement for any special return requirements.
Remember that international flight check-in typically closes 45 minutes before departure, and it's recommended to arrive at least 2-2.5 hours before your flight.
